sn22.77:1.5: yadanatta tam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti …pe… evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn22.77:2.1: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako rupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanayapi … sannayapi … sankharesupi … vinnanasmimpi nibbindati.
sn22.77:2.2: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati. Vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn22.77:2.3: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
sn22.77:2.4: Yavata, bhikkhave, sattavasa, yavata bhavaggam, ete agga, ete settha lokasmim yadidam arahanto”ti.
